Project Quantum

 Wits University

*Click on the IMAGE above to view projects*


Completed Project Details:


- Upgrade old network infrastructure to provided WIFI access across all campuses of WITS (central and remote campuses)

- Project duration: 28 months (on and off),

- Spliced Data Centre patch panels +- 20,

- Spliced Mini Distribution patch panels +- 150,

- Combination of OM2, OM3, OM4, Single Mode and Multimode splicing +- 5000,

- OTDR trace results +- 5000,

- Installed Cabinets, floor and wall mount, internal and external Access Points, built cable routes, removed old equipment and migrated from old to new equipment while keeping the campus wifi accessable with minimal downtime.
